title: Friend,
text: Sefaria is your library, here to support all your learning needs. As a nonprofit, we rely on the generosity of learners like you to keep our website and app growing. And thanks to your support, we are on track to raise the final $200,000 we need to meet Sefaria's budgeted expenses for the year.
If youâ€™ve benefited from our texts, translations, or learning opportunities in 2022, please make an investment in the future of the library today, and help us meet our goal. Thank you.
name: 2022-12-08-end-of-year-msg01
